name: Avatar Maker: Fairies
description:
Want to create an avatar of a new cartoonish fairy? Or maybe you dream of a picture of your favorite character but are not good at drawing? Our game is what you need! The app offers a large variety of fragments to make up your original fairy character. Customize her eyes, lips, cheeks, make-up, hair, clothes, wings, and other attributes. Share your pic or set it as wallpaper.
* Makeup and dress up (wardrobe) girls fairies
* 10,000+ fantasy character options
* Save and share features
* Flexible color options
* A great variety of stunning accessories
In our app, you can organize your own magic fairy community, and enjoy your beautiful avatars.
Add your characters to comics and make up your own adventurous stories! (^_^)
